poliastro2.worldview.solar_sys.constants¶

Description¶

This subpackage contains constants for solar system visualizations and calculations, including general, mean, and rotational parameters.

Modules¶

  • general: General constants for solar system bodies.

  • mean_elements: Mean orbital elements for solar system bodies.

  • rotational_elements: Rotational parameters and elements.

Modules

general

Astronomical and physics constants.

mean_elements

@author: Dhruv Jain, Multi-Body Dynamics Research Group, Purdue University.

rotational_elements
